channel.title: You ask a girl out and she says lets be friends. What do you say or do?
channel.description:
Lol this not a stupid post but if you've ever been rejected like this before what did you do or say?
Here's what I did. Me and my friend went hitting on girls today at the theater, we hit on like 9 girls probably and 4 out of 9 of them said lets be friends. I told the 3rd girl that rejected me: Fuck no, I have friends here already I need a girl! And she laughed as she walked away, I expected her to react to this as an insult though lol. Meanwhile, my mates are back there looking at me with my frown as I look at the girl and she walks out the door - they started laughing. Lol, I h8 that type of shit. Most fucked up part about it the bitch didn't even have anyone with her, it was her by herself, and she needed a ride lol. We were gonna give her a ride but I told them don't fuck her.
lol,
hope it wasn't anyone's(here) siblings that I left alone at like 12:30 at night lol
==========
But yeah, has this happen to you before?

item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

Repeat everything she says

her “let’s be friends”
you “let’s be friends”
her “ok then”
you “ok then”
her “stop that!”
you “stop that!”
her “Really, shut the fuck up!”
you “Really, shut the fuck up!”
her “Fuck you.”
you “FInally! I know this nice little alley…”
